alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 3:26PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Portage and southeastern Marathon Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mosinee, or 14 miles northwest of Stevens Point, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Stevens Point around 345 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
